meanings.definition: Situated at the tip or apex.
meanings.sent1: The abapical part of the mountain was covered in snow.
meanings.sent2: The lighthouse's abapical light guided ships safely to shore.
meanings.sent3: The abapical cherry on top of the cake made it irresistible.
meanings.sent4: Her abapical intelligence shone brightly in the classroom.
meanings.sent5: The abapical star in the sky twinkled with brilliance.

meanings.sent1: The abapical shelf in the store held the most expensive items.
meanings.sent2: The abapical floor of the skyscraper offered a breathtaking view.
meanings.sent3: His abapical score in the game made him the champion.
meanings.sent4: The abapical tree in the forest stood tall and proud.
meanings.sent5: The abapical peak of the mountain was a challenging climb.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the top or highest part.
meanings.sent1: The abapical section of the building housed the executive offices.
meanings.sent2: The abapical layer of the atmosphere protects us from the sun's rays.
meanings.sent3: The abapical note in the song brought it to a beautiful end.
meanings.sent4: Her abapical position in the company gave her authority.
meanings.sent5: The abapical flower in the garden bloomed vibrantly.
